text: The bravo-1 project is a MongoDB-based media planning system migrated from PostgreSQL. It uses MongoDB running on localhost port 27017 with database name bravo-1
Backend server runs on port 3001 using Express
Frontend uses Vite and runs on port 5174
ETL pipeline located at scripts/etl/run-full-etl-pipeline.ts has idempotency issues - running it multiple times creates duplicate entries for strategies, lineItems, platformBuys, and mediaPlans
To run the ETL pipeline: bun run scripts/etl/run-full-etl-pipeline.ts
The media-tool project uses PostgreSQL on port 5432
Campaign validation fails for 135 records during ETL import
Run npm install to install dependencies
